title: Argentina Bought $808 Million from US to Pay IMF, La Nacion Says
description: Argentina bought $808 million in special drawing rights from the US Treasury to confront its latest interest payments at the International Monetary Fund without tapping a swap line shared between both countries, according to the local newspaper La Nacion.
content: Argentina bought $808 million in special drawing rights from the US Treasury to confront its latest interest payments at the International Monetary Fund without tapping a swap line shared between both countries, according to the local newspaper La Nacion.
